dcterms:description: A collection of maps for the StarCraft II Learning Environment focused on multi-agent tasks, where n units from the player team are individually controlled to achieve victory against m units from the adversary team. Each unit belongs to one of multiple classes, described by different state variables and having different action sets and optimal policies.
dcterms:title: StarCraft Multi-Agent Challenge (SMAC)
